translations: v.保护，保存；节省，节约（conserve的第三人称单数形式）

phrs.translation: 建筑节能, 狭长用地全朝阳户型设计, 硬泡聚氨酯防水保温复合屋面, 室内设计中装修材料的质感研究

sentences.sentence: It conserves resources, running daemons only when needed.
sentences.translation: 它只在需要时运行守护进程，这可以节省资源。

sentences.sentence: This conserves memory by permitting fewer DB2 "back end" connections to service the application connections.
sentences.translation: 该功能只允许较少的DB 2“后端”连接为应用程序连接服务，从而节省了内存。

sentences.sentence: Here the brain also conserves cognitive processing energy by breaking the page into chunks of three or four results.
sentences.translation: 同时大脑为了节约“认知”的资源，它把页面分成三条四条结果的小块。
